sense.gloss: Amida Buddha's original vow, long-cherished desire

sdata.j: ↑他力本願↑↓たりき|ほんがん|↓じゃ、↑世↑↓よ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓↑渡↑↓わた↓っていけないよ。
sdata.e: You're overly reliant on people. You'll never make it in the world that way.

sdata.j: ↑他力本願↑↓たりき|ほんがん|↓じゃだめだよ。↑自分↑↓じぶん↓でなんとかしようという↑気持↑↓きも↓ちがなくちゃ。
sdata.e: You shouldn't rely on others. It's important to want to help yourself.
